00017 class FMBiGainArray

00021   FMBiGainArray(std::vector<short>& gain) : 
00022     _gain(gain)

00024   }
00025 
00026 
00028   void updateMove(const FMMoveInfo& moveInfo)
00029   {
00030     const unsigned int i_v = moveInfo._i_v;
00031     _gain[i_v] = -_gain[i_v];
00032   }
00033 
00034 
00036   void updateNeighbor(unsigned int , unsigned int i_w, short deltaGain)
00037   {
00038     _gain[i_w] += deltaGain;
00039   }
